name: JANAMANGAL (Center for Independent Living)

address: At: Baunsapal, Post: Rajberahampur, VIa: Nilagiri, DIst: Balasore, Odisha - 756058

briefDescription: JANAMANGAL (Center for Independent Living) is a non-governmental organization working on empowerment and enhancement of livelihood of tribal women in Nilagiri block of Odisha. In order to achieve our mission of empowering these women, we would like to start a program called Transforming the Lives of Tribal Women. The project aim is to create opportunities of livelihood, leadership and moral support for tribal women suffering from domestic violence. To fulfill this aim we are initiating a three Step program: Step 1: Rescue, Step 2: Cure, Step 3: Rise

address: At: Baunsapal, Post: Rajberahampur, VIa: Nilagiri, DIst: Balasore, Odisha - 756058
